SEARCH
Package com.myfinanceapp.service

Class GoalFormService

java.lang.Object
com.myfinanceapp.service.GoalFormService
public class GoalFormService extends Object
Service class for handling financial goal form operations. This class provides functionality for: - Validating goal form inputs - Creating new financial goals - Managing goal types and categories - Error handling and user feedback
Version:
4.0
Author:
SE_Group110

  • Method Details

    • validateForm

      public static boolean validateForm(User loggedUser, javafx.scene.control.TextField titleField, javafx.scene.control.TextField amountField, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> typeCombo, javafx.scene.control.TextField categoryField, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker deadlinePicker)
      Validates the goal form data. Checks for: - User login status - Valid amount format and value - Future deadline date
      Parameters:
      loggedUser - The currently logged-in user
      titleField - The goal title input field
      amountField - The target amount input field
      typeCombo - The goal type selection combo box
      categoryField - The goal category input field
      deadlinePicker - The deadline date picker
      Returns:
      true if all validations pass, false otherwise

    • createNewGoal

      public static Goal createNewGoal(User loggedUser, String title, String amount, String type, String category, LocalDate deadline, String currency)
      Creates a new Goal object with the provided information.
      Parameters:
      loggedUser - The user creating the goal
      title - The goal title
      amount - The target amount
      type - The goal type
      category - The goal category
      deadline - The goal deadline
      currency - The currency for the goal
      Returns:
      A new Goal object with the specified properties
